full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 Form G-135a Agency Name Check (Rev. 10-1-65) Office Boston, Mass. UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE File No. Immigration and Naturalization Service A-10 294 862(IB)AQM 150 Tremont St., Boston, Mass. 02111 DIRECTOR, CENTRAL INTELLIGENCE AGENCY Date May 10, 1966 2430 E Street, N.W., Washington, D. C. 20505 Attention: DEPUTY DIRECTOR, PLANS Please furnish any derogatory information that may be contained in your files concerning the following person. FBI Ident. Number (LAST NAME) (FIRST NAME) (MIDDLE NAME) DATE OF BIRTH PRESENT NATIONALITY July 15, 1908 China MAR Doo PLACE OF BIRTH MARITAL STATUS OTHER NAMES USED (Maiden name, names by former marriages, former names changed legally Kwangtung, China SINGLE WIDOW(ER) or otherwise, aliases, nicknames, etc. Specify which, and show dates used.) MALE FEMALE MARRIED DIVORCED MAR Au-Sang; MAR Gong-Doo HEIGHT WEIGHT COLOR COLOR IDENTIFYING MARKS EYES HAIR 5'4" 125 brown black - IF MARRIED, WIDOWED,ORDIVORCED,GIVEFULLNAMEAND DATEANDPLACEOF BIRTH OF SPOUSE OR FORMER SPOUSE. INCLUDE WIFE'S MAIDEN NAME. GIVE DATES AND PLACES OF ALL MARRIAGES OR DIVORCES. WONG Lai Yung, born October 1909 in Tung Hing Village, Toyshan, China, married subject on December 27, 1927 in Lung Shing Village, China.
